front.title: Internet Protocol Encapsulation of AX.25 Frames

abstract.t: This document describes a method for the encapsulation of AX.25 Link Access Protocol for Amateur Packet Radio frames within IP version 4 and version 6 packets. Obsoletes RFC1226. Note Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the author(s). The sources for this draft are at: https://github.com/irl/draft-rfc1226-bis
